msbt.message: The fireworks show has begun! You should try counting how many they shoot off. Counting fireworks will help you stay awake, I hear.
Watching fireworks is like watching the sky put on a fashion show.And what a bold, brash, beautiful fashion show it is!
I can't help but think that the fireworks decorating the night sky are a bit like each of us No matter what form they take, each one is a bright light that is gorgeous in its own unique way, .
Have you taken any photos yet? One can't help but want to capture such beauty forever. Of course, the fireworks you see with your own eyes will always be the most beautiful, .
No matter how often I see them, fireworks always enchant me.It's as if they have cast a spell on me that will never wear off, .

If I had to choose between a gift of one hundred fireworks or a gift of one hundred roses Why, I would choose the fireworks, of course!Though, darling, the gift giver really should consider tossing in the roses as well.
My pearls, it seems like everyone is absolutely glued to the fireworks show! I love it! Seeing everyone's happy faces lit up by those bursts of light It gives me a big ol' case of the smiles.

Goodness, is something wrong with my face? Why are you looking at me like that? Ahhh, I know! It's the light from the fireworks. It makes my eyes and face glow, no? Well, you go right ahead and stare if you like. I really can't blame you, .
Oh my, the finale already? How time flies when fireworks are sparkling!I really am going to miss those bright lights when they're gone, .
These beautiful fireworks won't go on much longer, .I confess, I'm going to miss the way they light up my face so prettily.

The fireworks are simply marvelous right now, don't you think?The lights! The sounds! Oooh, I get so very giddy at times like these!Dear me, please don't tell anyone you saw me act like such a silly little .
